og_title: Korean Visa & Education - Your Professional Guide
og_description: Looking to study in Korea? Get expert assistance with Korean visas, admission to Seoul and Busan universities, scholarships, and education programs. Visa Doctors - your trusted partner for Korean visa applications and university admissions!
our_services_description: We will help you with the paperwork and all the subtleties of obtaining a visa to the country of your dreams, we will tell you what to do and how to do it.

contact_us_description: Our friendly team will be happy to help you.

footer.slogan: Pay for results, not for the process

1.title: 1. General Provisions
1.content: This agreement regulates the legal relationship between the Visa Doctors service (hereinafter referred to as the "Service") and users (hereinafter referred to as the "User"). Use of the service indicates your agreement to these terms.

2.title: 2. Service Description
2.content: "Visa Doctors" is a platform that provides consultation and information services for obtaining visas for studying in the Republic of Korea. We do not have the right to issue or deny visas - this process falls under the authority of the Government of the Republic of Korea only.

3.title: 3. User Obligations
3.content:
- The user must use the service only for legal purposes.
- All information provided by the user must be accurate and complete.
- Use of the service for illegal, false, or harmful actions is prohibited.

4.title: 4. Personal Data Processing
4.content:
- We collect and process users' personal data only for use in the visa application process.
- Data will not be disclosed to third parties without the user's consent.
- The user may request to update or delete their personal data at any time.

5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
5.content:
- "Visa Doctors" does not guarantee visa results.
- We only provide information and consultation services to users.
- We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of the service.

6.title: 6. Legal Matters and Dispute Resolution
6.content:
- This agreement is governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the Republic of Uzbekistan.
- All disputes shall be resolved through negotiations, and if no agreement is reached, they shall be considered in the courts of the Republic of Uzbekistan.

7.title: 7. Changes and Updates
7.content:
- "Visa Doctors" reserves the right to make changes to this agreement at any time.
- Changes take effect from the date of their announcement on the site.
- The user accepts the new terms by continuing to use the service.

news.title: News
news.subtitle: Stay up to date with the latest changes in visa policy and get useful tips.

visa_policy_changes_2025.title: Changes in South Korea's Visa Policy in 2025
visa_policy_changes_2025.excerpt: South Korea has announced new rules for tourist and work visas, which will come into force on January 1, 2025.
visa_policy_changes_2025.content: The South Korean government has announced a number of important changes to its visa policy starting in 2025, aimed at developing tourism and the labor market. The new rules are designed to simplify the visa application process for various categories of applicants...

embassy_interview_tips.title: How to successfully pass an embassy interview: 5 tips
embassy_interview_tips.excerpt: An embassy interview is one of the most exciting stages. Our experts share proven tips to help you be more confident.
embassy_interview_tips.content: An embassy interview is a crucial part of the visa application process. These 5 tips will help you prepare and feel confident...

medical_visa_requirements.title: Medical examination for a visa: what you need to know
medical_visa_requirements.excerpt: Passing a medical examination is a mandatory requirement for many types of visas. Find out what tests are required and how to prepare for them.
medical_visa_requirements.content: The process of passing a medical examination for a visa to South Korea includes several standard checks. It is important to know what they include and how to prepare for the process...
